title: Singapore resident population as of June 2018 by ethnic group
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Population in thousands for 4 number of Ethnicitys.
Ethnicity Chinese has the highest Population in thousands and Others has the lowest Population in thousands.
The highest Ethnicity Chinese has 2840.63 more Population in thousands than the lowest Ethnicity Others.
min_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Ethnicity, and Population in thousands in each Ethnicity on the y axis.
The Population in thousands is highest at Ethnicity Chinese and lowest at Ethnicity Others.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Population in thousands for 4 number of Ethnicitys.
Ethnicity Chinese has the highest Population in thousands and Others has the lowest Population in thousands.
The highest Ethnicity Chinese has 2840.63 more Population in thousands than the lowest Ethnicity Others.
max_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Ethnicity, and Population in thousands in each Ethnicity on the y axis.
Ethnicity Chinese has the highest Population in thousands and Others has the lowest Population in thousands.
There is a difference of 2840.63 between the maximum Ethnicity Chinese and minimum Ethnicity Others.
Ethnicity Chinese is higher than any other Ethnicitys with value 2969.28, followed by Malays, and Indians. Down to Ethnicity Others with the lowest value 128.65.
The lowest value 128.65 at Others is almost 2.97 times smaller than the average value 998.57.
